questions.question_text: By default, which ServiceNow role can view reconciliation results?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
From the course:
Users with the sam_admin role can run on-demand reconciliation; users with sam_user role can only view reconciliation results.

questions.question_text: The process of determining compliance by comparing software rights owned with normalized software installations discovered is __________________ .

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
- Reconciliation: calculates the compliance status of software products with respect to discovered installations and defined software models and entitlements.

Selected Answer: D
Software reconciliation is an automated process that calculates compliance based on how many rights are in use compared to the number of active rights purchased. It keeps license positions accurate and up to date without manual calculations.

Selected Answer: B
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-it-service-management/page/product/software-asset-management2/task/t_ViewSWModelResultsSAMF.html

True-up cost: Estimated cost of remediating non-compliance based on the least number of rights needed (rights needed * average price per right from entitlements). The lowest cost from Purchase Rights remediation options.

questions.question_text: The definition for _________________ in the Reconciliation Product result is: “Estimated cost of remediating non-compliance based on the least number of rights needed.”
When reconciliation is run, a list of product results displays the compliance status of software versions and editions with respect to discovery and entitlements.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
- Reconciliation: calculates the compliance status of software products with respect to discovered installations and defined software models and entitlements.

Selected Answer: B
B: Software Model Result shows compliance status based on software version.

Selected Answer: B
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-it-asset-management/page/product/software-asset-management2/reference/Recon-swmodelresults-classic.html

I think it does show the version but not the compliance of the version? Not sure

comments.content:
Your link negates your answer. This produces a list of RECONSOLIATION results whilst question mentions a list of PRODUCT results which is not correct.
Should be B.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B

questions.question_text: In order to write to the reconciliation results, a user would need the following role in ServiceNow: sam_reconcile_user
